Posts.Content: Jul 29, 2010 10:31AM LisainVA wrote: Hi everyone - I participated in a Research Study to determine if 4 cycles of TCH was as good at 6 back at the beginning of 2009 - am glad I only had 4 cycles - the 4th one was a doozy!  I had herceptin throughout 2009.  I have had mammograms and mris since and am cancer free - woo hoo!  Good luck to everyone!
Posts.Title: Question on TCH 4 cycles versus 6?? GointoCarolina jackifp
